name: Idle magic herb
description:
This game is a hang up game that integrates elements such as cultivating immortals, farming, playing strange things, and collecting cards. Protect the liver and protect the liver.



Game features:
1. Simple on hook game. With a simple click, you can realize easy cultivation, farming and other game contents.
2. The aura in the game is obtained by farming. At present, there are 243 kinds of fairy grasses.
3. Fairy grass is divided into 5 grades. Higher quality can obtain more Reiki.
4. In terms of cultivation, it is divided into realm breakthrough, magic cultivation and demonic elimination tasks.
5. When you have enough aura, you can try to break through the realm. When you need to pay attention, it is likely that the upgrade will fail. At present, the highest level is level 19.
6. There are 19 spells in the game. With the prompt of the realm, you can also use multiple spells to attack the enemy at the same time. Spells can be upgraded by attacking monsters. Each spell can be upgraded to 100 levels.
7. In addition to demons, there are 30 monsters waiting for you to kill in the game. The higher the monster level, the stronger the fighting power. Note that if your combat power is lower than that of monsters. Each attack will deduct a certain amount of aura.
